DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate tolerable , safe , effective give INO-8875 eye drop adult glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Escalation Study Designed Evaluate Tolerability , Safety , Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , Efficacy Chronic Topical Ocular Application INO-8875 Adults With Ocular Hypertension Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject diagnosis ocular hypertension ( OHT ) primary openangle glaucoma ( POAG ) . 2 . Aged 18 75 year . 3 . Mean intraocular pressure ( IOP ) ≥24 ≤34 mm Hg . 1 . No significant visual field loss new field loss within past year . 2 . Cuptodisc ratio ≥0.8 3 . Central corneal thickness < 500 µm > 600 µm 4 . History adult asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease 5 . A recent ( acute ) chronic medical condition might obfuscate Subject 's study data
